message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of a price around $700,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $700,000 significantly undervalues the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $875,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to go up to $800,000. Can you consider this offer?
